title: A Big Fire in a Ski Resort
summary: A fire happened at a ski resort in Switzerland on New Year's Day. It was in a bar called Le Constellation in Crans-Montana. Many people were hurt, and some are thought to have died. Officials say it was a fire, not an attack. Emergency workers like helicopters and ambulances helped at the scene. They are trying to find out what caused the fire and help the families. People from different countries were there, and embassies are ready to help. The fire started early in the morning, and it made a big explosion because of the flames.
